CustomField.description: Google events are automatically created from the meeting. Google events only allow a status of confirmed or cancelled. So we are mapping the meeting status' to one of these. This is a a hidden field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Google events are automatically created from the meeting. Google events only allow a status of confirmed or cancelled. So we are mapping the meeting status' to one of these. This is a a hidden field.
CustomField.label: Status for Google Integration
